abstract: Jury selection begins in trial of Pedro Hernandez, who is accused of kidnapping and killing 6-year-old Etan Patz in 1979.
lead_paragraph: The 22-page questionnaire is the first step in the effort to find 12 jurors for the trial of Pedro Hernandez, who is accused of killing the 6-year-old Etan Patz in 1979.
snippet: The 22-page questionnaire is the first step in the effort to find 12 jurors for the trial of Pedro Hernandez, who is accused of killing the 6-year-old Etan Patz in 1979.

headline.main: On Patz Juror Questionnaire, Queries About TV Shows and Mental Health History
headline.print_headline: For Potential Patz Jurors, Queries on TV and Mental Health
